suite.name: Cek Tarif

kw.name: Open App
Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to the given Appium server. Capabilities of appium server, Android and iOS, Please check https://appium.io/docs/en/2.19/guides/caps/ | *Option* | *Man.* | *Description* | | remote_url | Yes | Appium server url | | alias | No | alias |

kw.name: Set Appium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout in ``seconds`` used by various keywords.
Buka aplikasi di device menggunakan package tanpa APK

kw.name: User Berada di Halaman Cek Tarif
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element specified by the ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Clicks the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text of the element with the ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Close App
Close Application
kw.doc: Closes the current application and the webdriver session.
Tutup aplikasi
